mapper.insert: insert into reply(db_type, rno, content, id, bno) values("FAQ", seq_reply.nextval, #{content}, #{id}, #{bno})
insert into reply(db_type, rno, content, id, bno) values("COMM", seq_reply.nextval, #{content}, #{id}, #{bno})
